00045 typedef struct {
00047         T2DInt Top;
00049         T2DInt Bottom;
00051         T2DInt Left;
00053         T2DInt Right;
00056         COLORTYPE Color;
00059         UINT16 Bits;
00061         unsigned int NumberOfPixels;
00064         unsigned int AllocatedPixels; /* internal use */
00066         T2DInt* pPos;
00070         UINT32* pColor;
00071 } TPixelGroup;

00340 /*  IMPORTANT: Replaced by k_CopyGroupToImage(), only here for IPL98 to be backward compatible
00341         Copy a PixelGroup to a binary image.
00342         @param Color If HIGHCOLOR the pixels in the group are set to white (1). If LOWCOLOR
00343         pixels in the group are set to black (0). Background is initialised to the inverse
00344         value.
00345         @param pDest Image to copy the group to. All previous information in pDest is
00346         destroyed. */
00347 bool k_GroupToBinaryImage(const TPixelGroup* pPixelGroup,COLORTYPE Color,TImage* pDest);
00348 
00349 /*  IMPORTANT: Replaced by k_CopyGroupToImage(), only here for IPL98 to be backward compatible
00350         Copy a PixelGroup to a gray tone image. Needs the source image to get the original
00351         pixel values. If the pixel values is included in the PixelGroup (in the pColor
00352         member) use the function k_GroupColorsToGrayImage().
00353         @param Background Pixel colors in new image background.
00354         @param pSource Image to get the original pixel values from. The PixelGroups positions
00355                 must be derived from this image.
00356         @param pDest Image to copy the group to. All previous information in pDest is
00357         destroyed. */
00358 bool k_GroupToGrayImage(const TPixelGroup* pPixelGroup,UINT8 Background,
00359                                                    const TImage* pSource, TImage* pDest);
00360 
00361 /*      IMPORTANT: Replaced by k_CopyGroupToImage(), only here for IPL98 to be backward compatible
00362         Copy a PixelGroup with pixel values to a new image. 
00363         @param Background Pixel colors in new image background.
00364         @param pDest Image to copy the group to. All previous information in pDest is
00365         destroyed. */
00366 bool k_GroupColorsToGrayImage(const TPixelGroup* pPixelGroup,UINT8 Background,
00367                                                           TImage* pDest);
00368
